mapper.sql: medicine_id, medicine_Approval_Number, medicine_Name, medicine_English_Name, medicine_Dosageform_Category, medicine_Manufacturer, medicine_Specification, medicine_Manufacturing_Address, medicine_Category, medicine_Approvaldate, medicine_Original_Approval_Number, medicine_Suppliers_id, medicine_country, medicine_Picture, medicine_Purchase_Price, medicine_Retail_Price, medicine_Wholesale_Price,stock_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_medicine
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT tb_supplier.supplier_Name, tb_supplier.supplier_Warehouse, tb_supplier.supplier_Warehous_Tel, tb_supplier.supplier_Contacts_name, tb_supplier.supplier_Contacts_tel, tb_medicine.medicine_id, tb_medicine.medicine_Approval_Number, tb_medicine.medicine_Name, tb_medicine.medicine_English_Name, tb_medicine.medicine_Dosageform_Category, tb_medicine.medicine_Manufacturer, tb_medicine.medicine_Specification, tb_medicine.medicine_Manufacturing_Address, tb_medicine.medicine_Category, tb_medicine.medicine_Approvaldate, tb_medicine.medicine_Original_Approval_Number, tb_medicine.medicine_country, tb_medicine.medicine_Picture, tb_medicine.medicine_Purchase_Price, tb_medicine.medicine_Retail_Price, tb_medicine.medicine_Wholesale_Price, tb_stock.stock_Amount, tb_warehouse.whse_Name FROM tb_medicine LEFT JOIN tb_stock ON tb_stock.medicine_id = tb_medicine.medicine_id AND tb_medicine.stock_id = tb_stock.stock_id LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse ON tb_stock.whse_id = tb_warehouse.whse_id LEFT JOIN tb_supplier ON tb_medicine.medicine_Suppliers_id = tb_supplier.supplier_id

select medicine_id, medicine_Approval_Number, medicine_Name, medicine_English_Name, medicine_Dosageform_Category, medicine_Manufacturer, medicine_Specification, medicine_Manufacturing_Address, medicine_Category, medicine_Approvaldate, medicine_Original_Approval_Number, medicine_Suppliers_id, medicine_country, medicine_Picture, medicine_Purchase_Price, medicine_Retail_Price, medicine_Wholesale_Price,stock_id from tb_medicine m where m.medicine_id = #{medicineId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_medicine (medicine_id, medicine_Approval_Number, medicine_Name, medicine_English_Name, medicine_Dosageform_Category, medicine_Manufacturer, medicine_Specification, medicine_Manufacturing_Address, medicine_Category, medicine_Approvaldate, medicine_Original_Approval_Number, medicine_Suppliers_id, medicine_country, medicine_Picture, medicine_Purchase_Price, medicine_Retail_Price, medicine_Wholesale_Price,stock_id) values (#{medicineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicineApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineDosageformCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineManufacturingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineApprovaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{medicineOriginalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineSuppliersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicineCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicinePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicinePurchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{medicineRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{medicineWholesalePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update tb_medicine
medicine_id = #{record.medicineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medicine_Approval_Number = #{record.medicineApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Name = #{record.medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_English_Name = #{record.medicineEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Dosageform_Category = #{record.medicineDosageformCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Manufacturer = #{record.medicineManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Specification = #{record.medicineSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Manufacturing_Address = #{record.medicineManufacturingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Category = #{record.medicineCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Approvaldate = #{record.medicineApprovaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
medicine_Original_Approval_Number = #{record.medicineOriginalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Suppliers_id = #{record.medicineSuppliersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medicine_country = #{record.medicineCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Picture = #{record.medicinePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Purchase_Price = #{record.medicinePurchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
medicine_Retail_Price = #{record.medicineRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
medicine_Wholesale_Price = #{record.medicineWholesalePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
stock_id = #{record.stockId,jdbcType=Integer},

update tb_medicine set medicine_id = #{record.medicineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medicine_Approval_Number = #{record.medicineApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Name = #{record.medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_English_Name = #{record.medicineEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Dosageform_Category = #{record.medicineDosageformCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Manufacturer = #{record.medicineManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Specification = #{record.medicineSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Manufacturing_Address = #{record.medicineManufacturingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Category = #{record.medicineCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Approvaldate = #{record.medicineApprovaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, medicine_Original_Approval_Number = #{record.medicineOriginalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Suppliers_id = #{record.medicineSuppliersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medicine_country = #{record.medicineCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Picture = #{record.medicinePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Purchase_Price = #{record.medicinePurchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, medicine_Retail_Price = #{record.medicineRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, medicine_Wholesale_Price = #{record.medicineWholesalePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock_id = #{record.stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_medicine
medicine_Approval_Number = #{medicineApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Name = #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_English_Name = #{medicineEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Dosageform_Category = #{medicineDosageformCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Manufacturer = #{medicineManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Specification = #{medicineSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Manufacturing_Address = #{medicineManufacturingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Category = #{medicineCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Approvaldate = #{medicineApprovaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
medicine_Original_Approval_Number = #{medicineOriginalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Suppliers_id = #{medicineSuppliersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medicine_country = #{medicineCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Picture = #{medicinePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_Purchase_Price = #{medicinePurchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
medicine_Retail_Price = #{medicineRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
medicine_Wholesale_Price = #{medicineWholesalePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=Integer},
where medicine_id = #{medicineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_medicine set medicine_Approval_Number = #{medicineApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Name = #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_English_Name = #{medicineEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Dosageform_Category = #{medicineDosageformCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Manufacturer = #{medicineManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Specification = #{medicineSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Manufacturing_Address = #{medicineManufacturingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Category = #{medicineCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Approvaldate = #{medicineApprovaldate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, medicine_Original_Approval_Number = #{medicineOriginalApprovalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Suppliers_id = #{medicineSuppliersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medicine_country = #{medicineCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Picture = #{medicinePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_Purchase_Price = #{medicinePurchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, medicine_Retail_Price = #{medicineRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, medicine_Wholesale_Price = #{medicineWholesalePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where medicine_id = #{medicineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
